subject: Soccer
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Brain
lead_paragraph: The advanced case of C.T.E. in Bellini, a Brazilian who died in March, indicated again to researchers that the brain disease is not connected merely to boxers and American football players.
